person.persName: Ebenezer C. Guest (Butler County, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster)

body.p: Butler county, Kentucky, merchant and postmaster. New York native. Married to Ester M. Evans Guest in Robertson County, Tennessee, on October 20, 1843. Father of Elenor Guest, Henry C. Guest, and Laurie Guest. Merchant in Butler County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Butler County in 1850. Postmaster of Rochester in Butler County from June 25, 1850 to August 27, 1853. Merchant in Butler County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Butler County in 1860. Assigned arms by the military board of Kentucky as a member of the infantry.
